About

Solution-focused Python developer with a flair for data analysis and automation, excelling in test-driven development and client-centric delivery.

I am a python developer with 3+ years of experience and I have robust problem-solving skills and proven experience in creating and designing software in a test-driven environment. And also I'm highly effective at Data analysis and task automation using python. Exceptionally interpersonal communication, and multitasking abilities to deliver first-rate results to clients.

Current Focus: Django // React // Rest API // Data analysis

Experience

Turing

Python Developer | AI Trainer(ChatGPT)
  • Over the last year and a half at Turing, I have honed my skills as a Python developer and AI trainer, specializing in ChatGPT training, where I contributed to the development and enhancement of AI-driven solutions to OpenAI through Turing Inc.
Jan 2023 - Present | Palo Alto, California

ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE INSTITUTE

Backend Developer

Backend Development and System Integration at Ethiopia Artificial Intelligence Institute

Develop Product
  • Engineered multiple projects including plan and report systems, and user management systems, utilizing Python Django, React JS, and REST APIs.

  • Guide best practices around accessible, semantic UI/UX
  • Maintained high standards of code quality and system security through rigorous testing and adherence to best practices in web development.
  • Tools: Python Django // React JS // REST API // HTML, CSS
Accomplishments
  • Significantly contributed to the development and deployment of key projects, enhancing the operational efficiency and digital infrastructure of the Ethiopia Artificial Intelligence Institute.
  • Designed and implemented REST APIs, facilitating seamless data flow and integration between diverse systems and services.
Sept 2023 - Present | Addis Ababa, Ethiopia

UPWORK

Freelancer

Freelance Software Development on Upwork

EXPERIENCE OVERVIEW
  • For over two years, I've successfully freelanced on Upwork, focusing on the development of client-centric projects across various domains. My portfolio includes a diverse array of applications, from Video Editing Tools to innovative Social Media Chat Applications built with Django and containerized via Docker for streamlined deployment.
PROJECT HIGHLIGHTS
  • Engineered a versatile Video Editing Platform, enabling users to manipulate media with ease and precision.
  • Developed a Social Media Chat App using Django, featuring robust functionality and Docker deployment for enhanced scalability and ease of use.
  • Specialized in data extraction, demonstrated by scraping Trade Data directly from the Government of Canada's official site, offering valuable insights into trade dynamics.
  • Extracted comprehensive cryptocurrency data from CoinGecko, providing clients with up-to-date market information and trends.
TOOLS & TECHNOLOGIES
  • Utilized a robust tech stack to deliver high-quality solutions tailored to client needs, including Python, Django, Bootstrap, CSS, HTML, Pandas, Selenium, and Web Scraping techniques. This diverse toolkit enabled the delivery of highly functional, user-friendly applications that met and exceeded client expectations.
Aug 2020 - Nov 2022 | Upwork, Remote

Competitive Programmer

Competitive Programming and Problem Solving at CSEC-ASTU Club

ACHIEVEMENTS IN COMPETITIONS

SKILL ENHANCEMENT
  • Gained practical experience in data structures and various Python libraries, strengthening problem-solving capabilities.
  • Enhanced problem-solving proficiency, leading to increased confidence in tackling new challenges with a strategic and open-minded approach.
  • Contributed to personal growth and improved self-esteem through the successful assumption of new responsibilities and challenges.
IMPACT AND DEVELOPMENT
  • Developed critical thinking and analytical skills essential for debugging and problem-solving, directly contributing to the enhancement of programming expertise.

  • Embraced a continuous learning mindset, leading to the mastery of new technologies and programming languages, thereby expanding technical proficiency and adaptability.
